pullRequest.title: [lsp] Add support for LSPExtensions
pullRequest.bodyText:
This adds the ability to extend the list of commands supported by the GraalLS through other instruments that provide the new LSPExtension service. See LSPExtensionTestInstance for an example.
Based on this change and #2906, we were able to implement Live Programming features on top of GraalLS and GraalVM's extension for VS Code.
Please assign to @dbalek and discuss! /cc @MartinBalin and @chumer

commit.message:
Add support for LSPExtensions

This adds the ability to extend the list of commands supported by the GraalLS through other instruments that provide the new LSPExtension service.

nodes.bodyText: With Env this is quite powerful. This allows an arbitrary instrumentation and can potentially be abused. How it's used? Would some restricted access be sufficient?
